utils

Class DataFileAccessClt

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.DataFileAccessClt

  • public class DataFileAccessClt
extends java.lang.Object
    class implementing clients for requesting reading a range of vectors residing in a remote file in a remote file-system.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2018

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String _host 
      private int _port 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataFileAccessClt()
      default constructor assumes the file-access server lives in the same host (localhost) listening in port 7899.
      DataFileAccessClt(java.lang.String host, int port)
      constructor specifies the host and port where the msg passing coordinator server lives, and also the name of the coordinator with whom all sends and receives will coordinate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getServerCacheStatsForFile(java.lang.String filename)
      return a string representation of the server cache for the given filename.
      java.util.List readVectorsFromRemoteFile(java.lang.String filename, int fromind, int toind)
      reads a vector of VectorIntf objects specified as a range in a sequence of such objects specified in a file residing in a remote file- system of the host specified in the constructor of the object.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • readVectorsFromRemoteFile

        public java.util.List readVectorsFromRemoteFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                int fromind,
                                                int toind)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                ParallelException,
                                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException,
                                                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        reads a vector of VectorIntf objects specified as a range in a sequence of such objects specified in a file residing in a remote file- system of the host specified in the constructor of the object.
        Parameters:
        filename - String fully qualified (posibly network) path-name of the file to read vectors from
        fromind - int the starting index of the range (inclusive, including zero)
        toind - int the ending index of the range (inclusive, including zero)
        Returns:
        List // List<VectorIntf>
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ParallelException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
